Thank you for contributing to the mod! Before you submit your Pull Request, please check that you have addressed the points below. Filling out this template will help us review your PR more quickly ðŸ˜Š.

## Description of Changes

Clearly describe what changes you have made and why. Provide context so that others can understand the purpose of this PR. Please include any relevant details â€“ for example, what bug is fixed or what feature is added, and why it is beneficial.

## Related Issue

If this PR fixes or is related to an open issue, please link to it (e.g., "Fixes #123"). This helps us track the PR and understand its context.

## Checklist

- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code and ensured it follows the project's coding guidelines.
- [ ] I have tested the changes in-game to confirm everything works as expected.
- [ ] I have updated documentation (README or Wiki) if my changes require it.
- [ ] I have added credit in the mod (e.g., credits section) if I introduced new content, or I am fine with being credited by the maintainers.
- [ ] My submission follows the [Contributing Guide](../CONTRIBUTING.md) and I have adhered to the [Code of Conduct](../CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md).

---

Once all the boxes are checked, you can confidently submit your pull request! We'll review it and provide feedback as soon as possible. Thank you for helping improve the mod ðŸŽ‰.
